And it shall be <S%H2654><s%>, if you have no delight in her <S%H7971><s%>, then you shall let her go where she will <S%H5315><s%>; but you shall not sell <S%H4376><s%> her at all <S%H4376><s%> for money <S%H3701><s%>, you shall not make merchandise <S%H6014><s%> of her <S%H834><s%>, because you have humbled her <S%H6031><s%>.

And all the men <S%H582><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him with stones <S%H68><s%>, that he die <S%H4191><s%>: so shall you put <S%H1197><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H3478><s%>; and all Israel shall hear <S%H8085><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%>.

His body <S%H5038><s%> shall not remain all night <S%H3885><s%> upon the tree <S%H6086><s%>, but you shall in any wise <S%H6912><s%> bury <S%H6912><s%> him that day <S%H3117><s%>; (for he that is hanged <S%H8518><s%> is accursed <S%H7045><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>;) that your land <S%H127><s%> be not defiled <S%H2930><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
